data.message:
Hi I am in desperate need of help
I was trying to make an account for my daughter so she can play a game on the facebook gameroom but its linking itself to my account and now i cant get it off or get into the gameroom
can you help me please

replies.message: Hi Shannon. In order for another user to have a different profile in Gameroom, your daughter would need to have her on Facebook profile and you would need to log out of the profile you are currently signed into and log into her account. Thank you! -Caitlin
So how would I get the one I tried to make for her unlinked from mine, it's stuck with no way to cancel it out.
